title: Industrial Type Stye ID Font
content:
I'm looking for help in identifying the font on [this logo piece](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019160040/http:/allanpeters.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/ESPN_PDM_Logo_051.png). I believe "media" is in Gotham Rounded, but I'm more interested in the title font as it has somewhat of an industrial feel to it.

Thank you for your help, it's greatly appreciated.
author: zerimar3
